name: The Gotham Lab
tag_list: translations, translation-services, translation-company, localization-services, multimedia-localization, subtitling-services, voice-over
overview: The Gotham Lab is a trusted provider of translation and multimedia localization services to Fortune 500 Companies, Government Entities, Small Businesses and Individuals worldwide. Located in the heart of New York City, The Gotham Lab’s tremendous in-house translation resources and state-of-the-art multimedia production facility sets them apart from their competitors. With the Gotham Lab as your partner, you can bid with confidence on any large multimedia localization project. The Gotham Lab never outsources any portion of your project or automates your customer service needs. You will always have a human project manager and point of contact for your project no matter how large or small. You and your project deserve human 1 on 1 attention and care and with The Gotham Lab, your translation or multimedia localization project will be treated as a priority every time.
